message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to get as close to my budget as possible.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $10500. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $11800?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to try to get closer to my target. How about we meet at $11200?
I understand you're trying to get closer to your target, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $11500?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to try to get closer to my target. How about we meet at $11000?
